About.paragraph: Founded on November 23, 1951, the Diocesan Shrine of St. Joseph is strategically located along one of the stations (Anonas) of the LRT system. The Shrine primarily caters to the Catholic faithful of eight barangays under the Diocese of Cubao. The current parish priest is Rev. Fr. Ronaldo M. Macale.

Contact.address: 965 Aurora Blvd, Project 3, Quezon City, Metro Manila

announcements.title: Sunday Service Times Change
announcements.content: Starting next month, our Sunday services will be held at 9:00 AM and 11:00 AM to accommodate our growing congregation.

announcements.title: Annual Picnic
announcements.content: Join us for our annual church picnic on July 15th at Lincoln Park. Bring a dish to share and enjoy fellowship with our church family.

announcements.title: New Bible Study Series
announcements.content: Pastor Mike will be starting a new Bible study series on the Book of Romans beginning this Wednesday at 7:00 PM.

announcements.title: Volunteers Needed
announcements.content: Our children's ministry is looking for volunteers to help during the 11:00 AM service. If interested, please contact Sarah at children@ourchurch.org.
